snippet: Defying predictions by pollsters, Gov. Sukhumbhand Paribatra retained his post, winning a hard-fought election against a candidate from the party of Prime Minister Yingluck Shinawatra.
lead_paragraph: Defying predictions by pollsters, Gov. Sukhumbhand Paribatra retained his post, winning a hard-fought election against a candidate from the party of Prime Minister Yingluck Shinawatra.

headline.seo: Bangkok Governor Re-elected, Signaling Political Split
headline.main: Bangkok’s Governor Re-elected, Signaling Thailand’s Political Split
headline.print_headline: Bangkok’s Governor Re-elected, Signaling Thailand’s Political Split
